name: Sociable Soccer
description: SOCIABLE SOCCER is a brand new, super fast, action football game. Over 1,000 international teams & many game modes, developed with community feedback. Easy to play & hard to master, join our whole new World of Soccer ‘This is no ordinary football video game’ BBC News...
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7-3770 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 / AMD GPU Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
